      void beforeTest() 
      void connectionPassedToListenerIdenticalToThatPassedIntoNotify()
      Tests to check that the connection passed into notify is the same connection object that the listener receives from receivedConnection()
      void connectionReceivedCalledWhenNotifyCalledForSpecificListener()
      Tests to check that a listener's ConnectionListener.connectionReceived(Connection) method is called when the acceptor notifies it
      void listenerNotNotifiedIfNotSubscribed()
      Tests to check that a listener is not notified if it's not subscribed to the acceptor
      void listenerNotNotifiedIfUnsubscribesFromAcceptor()
      Tests to check that a listener is not notified if it was previously subscribed and then unsubscribes
      void notifyAllShouldCallConnectionReceivedOnAllSubscribedListeners()
      Tests that all listeners subscribed to the acceptor are notified when notifyAll is called
      void notifyShouldThrowExceptionWhenNullUsedForConnection()
      Tests that if null is used for the connection to notify a listener has come in, then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown
      void notifyShouldThrowExceptionWhenNullUsedForListener()
      Tests that if null is passed in for the listener to notify then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown
